details.sectionContent: Participants have to construct Bascule Bridge which works on Hydraulic mechanism.
model will be shown at the beginning of the event. According to it they have to construct a bascule bridge of specified dimensions.

Participants have to apply Hydraulic mechanism to the bridge. The judging criteria will be based on:
	1) Depending on working of Hydraulic mechanism.
	2) As per height of bridge and length of deck.
	3) Varying load test.
